attributes.additional_details: Today (July 15th) saw an additional 48553 cases of coronavirus - one of these being myself, an A level student & essential worker. To drop legislation ensuring masks during a third wave (when these numbers reflect those during the second lockdown) and further open up is morally wrong - it will lead to a more rapid spread of the illness, and cause unnecessary loss of lives. The government must prioritise the health & safety of the nation rather than their political reputation.
attributes.background: Stop the government’s plan to further open up and drop restrictions until it is safe to do so.
